message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with material recognition using reflectance, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of optical cameras and image processing techniques, which fall under cs.GR (Graphics) and cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper introduces a novel framework called reflectance hashing, which involves dictionary learning and binary hashing, indicating the involvement of machine learning and artificial intelligence, hence cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the use of discriminative information for efficient and accurate material recognition, which falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning).
